author: ceki
msg: - Updated many classes to reflect the name change
- The location info extraction code has beed factored out to its own class. New and improved extraction strategies to follow.
- Previously "transient" fields in LocationInfo are now serialized.

author: ceki
msg: - Added performance test results when running on Torino, an AMD Athlon XP 2600.
- Added tasks in performance.xml for measuring output to files in various modes.
